participant_1.name: Maggie
participant_1.personality: Creative and nurturing, with a love for homey activities.
participant_1.background: Knitting is my passion. I love to bake cookies. I am scared of dying. The county-wide bake sale is where I feel most at home. I have dogs.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and fun-loving, always ready to party and socialize.
participant_2.background: I am a party animal. My favorite movie is Mean Girls. I'm deathly afraid of heights. I own a cat and a dog.
